subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: Officials allowed Erin Taylor-Talcott to compete in the 50K racewalk at the U.S. Olympic trials as long as she agreed not to seek a spot in the men’s event at the London Games.
snippet: Officials allowed Erin Taylor-Talcott to compete in the 50K racewalk at the U.S. Olympic trials as long as she agreed not to seek a spot in the men’s event at the London Games.
